title: Mohsin Naqvi praises security forces for successful operation against terrorists in Hoshab
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 26 (APP): Minister for Interior Mohsin Naqvi has lauded the security forces for their successful operation against terrorists in Hoshab, Balochistan.
He praised the swift response of the Security Forces in defeating the nefarious designs of the terrorists.
He emphasized that the nation stands united with the security forces in the fight against terrorism and salutes their professionalism and valour.
